title: Thunder Snow
description: **THIS BOOK HAS UNDERGONE A COMPLETE REWRITE SINCE FIRST OFFERED ON A FREE GIVEAWAY** This steamy love story is about Jack and Callie, each running from the harshness of life to a small town that is known for its ‘live and let live’ attitude. In this easy-reading contemporary romance, Jack Franklin has a secret, and for years has been able to avoid the tourists who trek through his picturesque hamlet that overlooks an alluring body of water nestled in the Rocky Mountains. Callie Weston is running from her own demons and finds refuge in her father’s enchanting cabin carved into the side of the mountain. Jack’s world is shaken as their relationship deepens and sparks fly between them, but will their love be strong enough to overcome the ghosts of their pasts that will try to pull them apart?
author: Mimi Foster
